text: Nobody Runs Forever, also called The High Commissioner, is a 1968 political neo noir spy thriller movie directed by Ralph Thomas. It is based on Jon Cleary's 1966 novel The High Commissioner. It stars Rod Taylor as Australian policeman Scobie Malone and Christopher Plummer as the Australian High Commissioner. In August 1966 Cleary said Frank Sinatra was interested in buying the movie rights. ==References== Category:Australian thriller movies Category:1960s spy movies Category:1968 thriller movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Ralph Thomas
title: Nobody Runs Forever
